fields.description: Delegated subnet arm resource id. This is required to be passed during create, in case we want the server to be VNET injected, i.e. Private access server. During update, pass this only if we want to update the value for Private DNS zone.
fields.name: DelegatedSubnetResourceId

fields.description: Private dns zone arm resource id. This is required to be passed during create, in case we want the server to be VNET injected, i.e. Private access server. During update, pass this only if we want to update the value for Private DNS zone.
fields.name: PrivateDnsZoneArmResourceId

fields.description: public network access is enabled or not
fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
